rawNarrative.name: Opening Title
rawNarrative.description: A brief introduction to the Cascade Lakes Relay, setting the tone for excitement and community.

rawNarrative.name: Race Location Scenic Shots
rawNarrative.description: Scenic shots of the race location to visually engage and set the scene for the interviews.

rawNarrative.name: Racer 1 Interview
rawNarrative.description: Discussing preparation and looking forward to the race, conveying personal excitement and investment.

rawNarrative.name: Racer 2 Interview
rawNarrative.description: Exploring feelings about race and belonging to the racing community.

rawNarrative.name: Racer 3 Interview
rawNarrative.description: Sharing anticipation and personal thoughts before the race, highlighting community ties.

rawNarrative.name: Closing Scenes
rawNarrative.description: Concluding shots of all racers together, emphasizing the theme of community and excitement.

rawNarrative.name: Credits/Closing Title
rawNarrative.description: Quick wrap-up with credits or acknowledgements, reinforcing the theme of the video.
